title: Ticket #6981: Add non-blocking support for SSL authentication
description:
One potential future mechanism for using SciTokens as an authentication method is to perform an SSL connection (client remains anonymous) and then client writes the token to the server over the encrypted connection.

To do that, however, we need to make SSL a non-blocking authentication method: we effectively can't make a blocking method exposed to the internet.

Let's do it!

All commits are on branch V8_9-gt6981
